ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: Spanning-Tree States

STEP.DESCRIPTION: First the port is enabled or initialized and it moves to blocking mode.
If the port is faulty or disabled then it moves to disable state.
If the port becomes root port or designated port then it moves the listening state.
If the port is faulty or disabled then it moves to disable state.
If the port ceases to be a root port or designated port then it moves back to blocking state.
If the forwarding time expires then the switch port moves to the learning state.
If the port is faulty or disabled then it moves to disable state.
If the port ceases to be a root port or designated port then it moves back to blocking state.
If the forwarding time expires then the switch port moves to the forwarding state.
If the port is faulty or disabled then it moves to disable.
If the port ceases to be a root port or designated port then it moves back to blocking state.
